hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util

Class ObservableToIterableAdapter<T,U>

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util.ObservableToIterableAdapter<T,U>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the observed element type
    U - the iterated element type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CloseableIterable<U>, Iterable<U>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Latest, MostRecent, Next, ToIterable

    public abstract class ObservableToIterableAdapter<T,U>
extends Object
implements CloseableIterable<U>
    Base class to help receive values from an observable sequence through customizable iterator and observer.
    Since:
    0.97
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2013.01.12.
